data.name: Robocraft - Speed Bundle
data.detailed_description:
The Speed Bundle is your fast-track way to build the robot of your dreams in Robocraft. The bundle offers players seven days of Premium membership, multiple items and 500 Cosmetic Credits that can be used to buy cosmetic items in-game.

For a complete rundown of the items featured in the Speed bundle please see below:

  • 500 Cosmetic Credits. Cosmetic Credits can be used in the Item Shop to buy cosmetic parts and other customisation options to make your Robots stand out from the crowd.
  • 7 Days of Premium membership - doubles the rate of experience level progression and gives you more paint colors to use on your Robots
  • Speedometer to track the speed of a robot
  • Customisable Robot Name Badge
  • Headlamp cubes to light the area around a robot

Please note, the robots featured in the above promotional shots are not included in this bundle. This pack can only be purchased once per Steam account and after purchase the contents of this pack will be awarded on next log-in via Steam.

data.short_description: The Speed Bundle is your fast-track way to build the robot of your dreams in Robocraft. The bundle offers players seven days of Premium membership, multiple items and 500 Cosmetic Credits that can be used to buy cosmetic items in-game.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 2000/XP/Vista/7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel dual core or better with SSE2 support or equivalent AMD family
  • Graphics: Shader Model 3.0 Compatible GPU, DirectX 9.0c
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: Min resolution 1024x768

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.7+
  • Processor: Intel dual core or better with SSE2 support or equivilent AMD family
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Shader Model 3.0 Compatible GPU
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Min resolution 1024x768

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+
  • Processor: Intel dual core or better with SSE2 support or equivilent AMD family
  • Graphics: Shader Model 3.0 Compatible GPU
  • Additional Notes: Min resolution 1024x768
